verbose_text: Likewise, cyclin dependent kinase inhibitor combined with chemotherapy slightly increased the mean progression-free survival but also stimulated the senescence associated (SA) marker expression (assessed by the accumulation of by SA beta-galactosidase in the lysosome) by yet unknown mechanism [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor combined with chemotherapy slightly increased the mean progression-free survival but also stimulated the senescence
